meanings.definition: Relating to the study of earthquakes.
meanings.sent1: The seismologic data helped scientists understand the earthquake patterns.
meanings.sent2: Her seismologic research focused on predicting seismic activity.
meanings.sent3: The seismologic report made the class quake with excitement.
meanings.sent4: His seismologic expertise shook the foundation of traditional earthquake theories.
meanings.sent5: The seismologic findings painted a vivid picture of Earth's seismic behavior.

meanings.definition: The scientific study of earthquakes and the propagation of elastic waves through the Earth.
meanings.sent1: Studying seismologic allows us to learn more about earthquakes.
meanings.sent2: The seismologic of the region indicated potential seismic risks.
meanings.sent3: The seismologic class was full of earth-shaking experiments.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for seismologic was like a seismic wave, spreading knowledge everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The seismologic research team delved deep into the Earth's seismic mysteries.
